channel.title: wsl on Muggle L
channel.description: Recent content in wsl on Muggle L

item.title: Wsl2 Ubuntu20.04 配置 docker
item.description: 1. win10 2004 开启 wsl2 开启虚拟化平台组件 Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName VirtualMachinePlatform 开启 Linux 子系统组件 Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux 下载 wsl2 独立内核并安装 https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/windows/wsl/wsl2-kernel 设置 wsl2 为默认 wsl wsl --set-default-version 2 从 Microsoft Store 下载 Linux 系统 2. 配置docker 源 sudo apt update sudo apt install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.
